page.title: 15A TIBBERTON FARM
page.content: {FARMING}-He is a dairy farmer whith 40 cows,each is artifically inseminated.He also stores stock. A long time ago there was only one tractor on 25% of the farms. {TENANCY}-The farmer dosen't agree with tenancy.The farmer himself was a farmer's son and he would like his son to take over but the village council have other people in mind. {MOTORWAY}-When the motorway was built it created a noise nuisance. It also took away much of the landscape. They intend to widen which is going to take away even more of the farmer's land including hedges. {INDUSTRY}- He feels he isn't needed any more,because big industries produce things cheaper,so taking his business.
